    • 方法详细资料

      • createBlurredBitmap

        public static Bitmap createBlurredBitmap(Bitmap sentBitmap)
        Takes a bitmap and creates a new slightly blurry version of it.
        参数:
        sentBitmap - The Bitmap to blur.
        返回:
        A blurred version of the given Bitmap.

      • createBlurredBitmap

        public static Bitmap createBlurredBitmap(Bitmap sentBitmap,
                                         int radius)
        Takes a bitmap and creates a new slightly blurry version of it.
        参数:
        sentBitmap - The Bitmap to blur.
        radius - Radius of the blur effect.
        返回:
        A blurred version of the given Bitmap.
